item.title: About
item.description: Sandeep Lamba - DevOps Jedi The one who can save your day Self-motivated individual with 10+ years of IT experience Proficient in architecting and automating the infrastructure with AWS, Kubernetes and Terraform Experience in building scalable infrastructure, build and deployment Proficient in setting up the frameworks for Public/On-Prem Clouds Kubernetes Clusters Public/On-Prem Clouds Logging Monitoring Alerting Backup/Restore Databases Disaster Recovery Management Education Army Institute of Technology, Pune(India)
